channel.title: Tech Blog - Top Articles
channel.description: Popular articles from Tech Blog community

item.title: Building a Custom IoT Controller with ESP32
item.author: maker_dev
item.description:
In this article, I'll share my experience building a custom IoT controller using the ESP32 microcontroller. The project started when I needed to automate my home workshop...

Key challenges included handling sensor noise and optimizing power consumption.

item.title: How I Dealt with Banking Regulations: A Developer's Story
item.author: fintech_guy
item.description: Last month I promised to share how I resolved issues with account freezes related to anti-money laundering regulations. Here's the full story with practical advice for developers working in fintech.

item.title: Setting Up Satellite Internet: Adventures and Challenges
item.author: network_enthusiast
item.description:
I attempted to set up satellite internet connectivity in a remote area. The official service isn't available in my region, but I wanted to explore if it's truly impossible or just "officially impossible".

This article covers VPN configurations, hardware setup, and lessons learned.

item.title: Optimizing React Performance: Practical Tips
item.author: frontend_pro
item.description: After working on several large-scale React applications, I've compiled a list of practical performance optimization techniques. This guide covers memo, useMemo, useCallback, and virtual scrolling implementations.

item.title: Understanding Kubernetes Networking
item.author: devops_master
item.description: Kubernetes networking can be confusing. In this deep dive, I explain how pods communicate, how services work, and common pitfalls to avoid when setting up your cluster networking.

item.title: Why I Switched from VS Code to Neovim (And Back)
item.author: editor_warrior
item.description: A tale of two editors: my journey through Vim motions, LSP configuration, and ultimately finding the right balance between productivity and customization. Includes my dotfiles!

item.title: Machine Learning Model Deployment: From Notebook to Production
item.author: ml_engineer
item.description: Training a model is just the beginning. This article covers the entire deployment pipeline: model serialization, API design, containerization, and monitoring in production.

item.title: The Art of Code Review: Best Practices for Teams
item.author: team_lead
item.description: Good code reviews improve code quality and team knowledge sharing. Here's what I've learned about conducting effective reviews that don't slow down development.
